title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\Service\IstioCanonicalService
name: IstioCanonicalService
description:
Canonical service scoped to an Istio mesh. Anthos clusters running ASM >= 1.6.8 will have their services ingested as this type.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.Service.IstioCanonicalService

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.mesh_uid
params.description: Identifier for the Istio mesh in which this canonical service is defined. Corresponds to the mesh_uid metric label in Istio metrics.

params.name: data.canonical_service_namespace
params.description: The namespace of the canonical service underlying this service. Corresponds to the destination_canonical_service_namespace metric label in Istio metrics.

params.name: data.canonical_service
params.description: The name of the canonical service underlying this service. Corresponds to the destination_canonical_service_name metric label in label in Istio metrics.
